title: A good jungler for season 5
body:
Ive been doing incredibly well with Diana in the jungle, nice clear speed and can easly carry.
Here are some tips:

- start golems and instantly smite it to clear it faster ( make sure you ward behind it to stop any invade )
- take red then go straight to blue
- dont use your e on the camps, its got a long cooldown and doesnt deal damage
- farm as quick as you can till 6
- just because your low doesnt mean you cant farm so dont underestimate your clear speed
- to clear the jungle quicker, q, r to them, it wont put your r on cooldown

This is mainly for the lower level players so although it may sound noobie, its for the bronzies like myself!
Good luck and have fun!

replies.body: If you're getting blue 2nd why not start at the frog? seems like lots of wasted travel time.

Diana is a very fun champ which I enjoy playing but she will never be a top tier jungler due to weak early, lack of pre6ganks, vulnerability to lee sans, and hard to balance damage and tankiness on her.

She does however stomp the f**u**ck out of bronze with her snowball!

although her clear and shield are great, i don't feel she is top tier not by a long shot, mainly because she can only really have 1 itemization path and that it really cripples a team if there is no chance of a pre level 6 gank, i feel with this patch they are trying to bring back the utility/support tank junglers, so (IMO) the top tier junglers are : zac, pantheon, nunu, maokai, ammumu and xin (still trying a few others out but i feel zac is the best jungler in this patch), anyway don't just take my word for it, experiment, break the meta find your own top tier

Pantheon is the number one jungler/champion in this game.
Nunu is second in jungle.

double adc is the standard meta backed by double jungles (outside of pub derps)
